outcomes.name: Electrogonorrhea
outcomes.description: Any rustling in the trouser regions causes a painful electric jolt and a loud bang.

outcomes.name: Parasitic Shadows
outcomes.description: Small lumps of shadow. Normally hide in the infected person’s regular shadow but can be identified with bright multidirectional light. Slowly drains all colour from the victim.

outcomes.name: The Vapours
outcomes.description: Spell infects the skin, converting dead hair into noxious ammonia and sulphides. Smell is unbearable, cuts through perfume in minutes. Noticeable at 30'; intolerable within 10'.

outcomes.name: Personal Magnetism
outcomes.description: Victim becomes slightly magnetic. Iron filings stick. Delicate work with metal is impossible.

outcomes.name: Houndtongue
outcomes.description: Tongue grows 4” longer, slightly wider. No extra dexterity. Speech possible; drooling inevitable.

outcomes.name: Migratory Eyebrows
outcomes.description: Eyebrows slide about like slugs. Can be lured back into place temporarily with milk.

outcomes.name: Earworms
outcomes.description: Songs tangled up in spells. They play in the victim’s ear, exactly as the victim first heard them, over and over. Conversation is possible but irritating. Listening to other music is impossible.

outcomes.name: Theatrics
outcomes.description: Somehow infects the mind. Everything becomes dramatic. All speech hammed up, all gestures florid, all scenery chewed. Impossible to get any serious work or serious acting done.

outcomes.name: The Lurch
outcomes.description: Any time the victim runs, there’s a 10% chance per round they are flung 20' in random horizontal direction. Victim’s feet develop silver warts and scales.

outcomes.name: Stonehairs
outcomes.description: Hair slowly becomes solid and dense. Cut it with a chisel. Impossible to swim.

outcomes.name: Tongue Twisters
outcomes.description: Speechers of this enchanterly afflictment enbafflify and confuserate all vords, noons, and haberdashejtives in their spoinks. Moaning can be conveigled, but with dafferlecty.

outcomes.name: Decapitation
outcomes.description: Head floats 2” above neck stump. Blood, air, and food still flow normally, but there’s a distinct gap.

outcomes.name: Spidertears
outcomes.description: Victim cries tiny harmless black spiders. They tickle.

outcomes.name: Frogmarks
outcomes.description: Tiny green bumps appear on the skin, slowly growing to the size of large coins. In a week or so they burst, each one releasing a small, green, and extremely noisy frog.

outcomes.name: Illusionary Curse
outcomes.description: Starts on one limb. Limb becomes illusionary. Any solid impact pops it like a soap bubble. Limb reappears in 24 hours. Slowly spreads from one limb to the torso, and then the entire body.

outcomes.name: Pigeonfriend
outcomes.description: Victim becomes irresistible to pigeons. They want to perch, coo, and do their business.

outcomes.name: Suds
outcomes.description: Friction of skin-on-skin creates clouds of white antiseptic soap bubbles. They sing.

outcomes.name: Noselight
outcomes.description: Nose becomes large, red, and bulbous. Sheds as much light as a match. After three days, pops off and floats away. A new bulbous nose grows in its place to repeat the process.

outcomes.name: Rotating Fingers
outcomes.description: Placement of fingers on hands slowly rotates. Holding things is possible but not for more than an hour.

outcomes.name: Invisible Genitals
outcomes.description: External genitalia vanishes. They’re still there and fully functional, just invisible.
